scripts.dev: concurrently --names "BACKEND,ADMIN,SITE" --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta,blue" "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd \"frontend - admin\" && npm run dev" "cd \"witcet - site\" && npm run dev"
scripts.install-all: concurrently "cd backend && npm install" "cd \"Admin-Dashboard\" && npm install" "cd \"Witcet 3.0\" && npm install"
